name: Way
body:
### Welcome to Way Android.
This Software is the development build for a commercial project. The Way project is a smart software project that combine's light Geo location software with a very smart server service to control interaction between Devices and server.

```
Software will be made available through the Google Play Store 

```


### Server Registration
We have decided to make the entry point of the application on the way server [Way Register](http://way.org.za/way.org.za/client/Register.php). 
From here on you can install the application with the link from Google play. Just search for the Way Family Locator.

### Authors and Contributors
Developed by BooRar from NanoSoft. Any issues bugs and enhances you would like to see can be communicated through this site under Issues.
